description:
Tylor is given command of the space destroyer Soyokaze. The ship’s misfits crew isn’t very impressed with their new commander.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fune wa Deteiku Shikori wa Nokoru
La nave va, ma i dubbi restano
The Ship Sets Sail, but Misgivings Remain
艦[ふね]は出ていく シコリは残る
